channel.title: Galaxy X double xp weekend - 24-7 VPS
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2yx4w82.png[/img] [url=http://galaxyx.forumotion.com/"]Homepage[/url]||[url=http://galaxyx.forumotion.com/forum"]Forums[/url]||[url=http://galaxyx.forumotion.com/h3-webclient"]Webclient[/url]||[url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/xedxxwy3up6502d/client.jar?dl=1"]Desktop Client[/url] GalaxyX is a new private server, with a lot of potential. We offer a massive variety of different items, bosses, minigames, and areas to the players, to endorce maximum fun and enjoyability. GalaxyX is a 24/7 server, run from a VPS to ensure that the server experiences no lag. Our server has a friendly and cheerful community, helpful staff, and is always welcoming new players, whether they are veterans or just starting out.
Features! Custom home – Underground Cave! (Instead of edgeville, but there are still shops in edge) Custom Bosses (Including The Everlasting, Sea Troll Queen, Avatar of Destruction, etc) Loads of minigames (Warriors guild, Soul wars, Barbarian Assault, Pest Control, etc.) Custom Dungeoneering minigame. Custom Dominion Minigame Prestige System (Level all combat skills to 99, then reset them for 500 Prestige points) Loyalty System (Owner gives out loyalty points to people who help the server) Skills 100% working Stable economy Friendly Players Friendly Staff … and much much more!
Come and join GalaxyX today! You don't know what you are missing out on [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2j3qphe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/azhpxe.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/35b9smx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/5z0d54.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/sws08z.png[/img][/CENTER][/CENTER]
